Recommendations: The syllabi may be dated with semester and academic year. A uniform syllabus format may be adopted where the date prepared, semester and academic year in are be indicated.
The grading system is suggested to be included in all syllabi prepared by the faculty members.
The instructional materials prepared by the faculty need to be reviewed and approved for implementation by the Instructional Material Committee of the College.
The faculty members may be encouraged to publish their researches in refereed journals or in CHED accredited journals.
It is recommended to increase the scholarship grants to faculty members particularly stipend and thesis/dissertation support.
The varied activities of faculty members like Orientation, capability building, and seminars in the University need to be well documented.
The materials/documents for evaluation may be packaged separately for program evaluation (Business Administration department where BS Entrepreneurship course is included).
The task force or committee chairs and members for accreditation can be oriented on the packaging of relevant documents, exhibits and other materials.
The Faculty Development Program of the College may indicate specific academic degrees to be pursued by particular faculty members.
